DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy Optive versus Systane use concomitantly topical cyclosporine treatment dry eye .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Optive Versus Systane Concomitant With Restasis ( Cyclosporine A ) Treatment Dry Eye Symptoms
DOC.criteria: · Males female > 18 year old Score least 2 4 SESOD initial screen visit ( mild severe patient ) At least Grade 2 conjunctival stain Likely complete study visit able provide inform consent · Prior unsuccessful use topical cyclosporine ( defined patient take least 3 month saw improvement ) Current use topical cyclosporine Known contraindication study medication ingredient Female child bear potential use reliable method birth control , pregnant lactating female . Planned use contact lens ( unless discontinue use ³ 30 day prior randomization ) Active ocular disease uncontrolled systemic disease ( blepharitis patient actively treat disease uncontrollable ) Ocular surgery within past 3 month , Active ocular allergy
